question: Jeremy Lalrinnunga is related to which sports?
explanation: Weightlifter Jeremy Lalrinnunga  from Mizoram has recently clinched silver in men\'s 67kg category & fetched India\'s second medal in the EGAT\'s Cup International Weightlifting Championships in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Lalrinnunga lifted 131kg in the snatch and 157kg in clean and jerk for a total of 288 kg. Earlier, in the on-going event, world champion Saikhom Mirabai Chanu had won a gold in the women\'s 48-kilogram category with a total lift of 192 kilograms.
